text:
Credit: ennett Raglin/Getty Images for Haddad

Teresa Giudice Accused of Violating Her Probation — Will She Go Back to Prison?

by 0 Shares

Advertisement

It’s been a tough road for Teresa Giudice of late. The Real Housewives of New Jersey star lost her mother, Antonia Gorga, suddenly in early March, and now, she might be at risk of going back to prison?!

Well, not so fast. But there is cause for concern for fans of the Italian gal.

Credit: Charles Sykes/Bravo

According to court documents obtained by TMZ, Teresa failed to report two traffic tickets while under supervised release (aka probation) for her fraud conviction.

The first violation was for an illegal turn last year, and at the time, the 44-year-old was warned that if she had any other contact with police, she had to report it.

Credit: Instagram

Unfortunately, she didn’t do that when, last month, she was cited for using her cell phone while driving.

Because she didn’t tell her parole officer, it says in the docs that she will go to court should she violate the terms of her probation again.

A post shared by Teresa Giudice (@teresagiudice) on May 3, 2017 at 5:00am PDT

On the other hand, the mother of four’s attorney, James Leonard, Jr., is telling a different story.

In a statement to the press, the lawyer claims both tickets were reported — just not within the “required time frame.”

A post shared by Teresa Giudice (@teresagiudice) on Mar 24, 2017 at 3:39pm PDT

“Teresa's been fully compliant other than these incidents,” he starts.

James continues, “Both she and I have spoken to her officer and understand exactly what is required should she have any future contact with law enforcement, which we do not anticipate will happen.”

A post shared by Teresa Giudice (@teresagiudice) on May 9, 2017 at 12:14pm PDT

In other words, he doesn’t “anticipate” that she’ll be violating traffic laws anytime soon, but if she is, she knows to report it to her P.O. ASAP.

For now, it seems she’s just on a warning status, and hopefully she keeps it that way.

A post shared by Teresa Giudice (@teresagiudice) on Apr 14, 2017 at 5:02am PDT
title: Teresa Giudice Accused of Violating Her Probation — Will She Go Back to Prison?

meta_data.description: According to court documents, Teresa Giudice has been accused of violating her parole. Will she go back to prison? Find out what her lawyer says!
